description: Instructs one or more devices to start a task, such as unlocking or rebooting.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token ensuring that the action is called only once with the specified details. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: The task to be performed. Only one task is executed on a device at a time. reboot (dict) --- Reboots the device. unlock (dict) --- Unlocks the device.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Optional metadata that you assign to a resource. You can use tags to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: targets
parameters.description: A list of managed device IDs. (string) ---

nested_items.name: taskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the task that you created.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the task that you created.
